Delete email address(es)

DELETE /user/emails

Parameters

Name Type Description
emails array of strings Required. Deletes one or more email addresses from your GitHub account. Must contain at least one email address. Note: Alternatively, you can pass a single email address or an array of emails addresses directly, but we recommend that you pass an object using the emails key.

Example

{
  "emails": ["octocat@github.com", "support@github.com"]
}

Response

Status: 204 No Content
